description:
Miyata a very skilled outboxer who specializes in counter punches. Considered by many to be a boxing prodigy, he uses the boxing style his father used. After his father was forced to retire, Miyata decides to take on his style of boxing to prove its worth, and to go above and beyond him. He begins at Kamogawa Gym, but after losing to Ippo, he later transfers to Kawahara Gym in hopes of one day facing Ippo in an official match. Miyata himself looked down on Ippo a little at first, but after he helped Ippo to buy new boots for their first match, he started to respect him more, developing a friendly rivalry.
Source: wiki
name: Miyata Ichirou
